content: अभूमिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Non-earth, any thing but earth. {@--2@} An unfit place or object, no proper object for, beyond the reach or scope of; अभूमिरियं मालविकायाः <ls>M. 3</ls>; अभूमिरियमविनयस्य <ls>Ś. 7</ls>; स खलु मनोरथानामप्यभूमिर्विसर्जनावसरसत्कारः {%<ab>ibid.</ab>%} far exceeded or transcended my (highest) expectations; <ls>Śi. 1. 42</ls>; <ls>Śānti. 4. 22</ls>, <ls>K. 45</ls>, <ls n="K.">196</ls>, <ls n="K.">204.</ls>
